posts.post_content:
I need to know if this card is from 1911 or a fake, and if this card has been trimmed or is a FULL card

[IMG]http://net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=95&pictureid=1479[/IMG]

[IMG]http://net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=95&pictureid=1480[/IMG]

Posted in wrong section, but from the scan it looks like an authentic T205 (not T207) card that is not trimmed.

Brian
